summary: This document contains surveillance observations and police call records related to Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida. It details various vehicles observed at the property and police responses to alarms and incidents at the location.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the owner of the property at 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida, where multiple police calls and surveillance activities were recorded.

persons.context: Josef Torres is mentioned as a caller reporting incidents at Epstein's residence, specifically related to an accident and alarm responses.

events.title: Surveillance of Epstein's Residence

events.title: Police Response to Alarm

events.title: Continued Surveillance
events.description: Further surveillance noted the same vehicles at Epstein's residence, indicating ongoing activity.
